channel.title: Sakrecoer
channel.description: Sakrecoer Uncorporated Stands for independent fun-loving Activism, Art & Music. I push sounds, images, thoughts and passion for cool robots like you. I am funky and I deliver because I was born tomorrow.
channel.itunes:summary: Rare contemporary music, Founded in 2010, Basspistol is the Outernational Music Syndicate
